case.state: It's nice to meet you, Mari. This is... what you would call a mix of the two, though I'm not a Knight yet.
Barbara! Are you training here as well? How unorthodox for someone of your position.
Ooh! How exciting! A-a-ahem...hmm!
Hello! I'm Noelle: a maid in service to the Knights of Favonius.
I will protect you! Oh wait...no one needs protection, do they?
I'm... so happy you chose me to play along. I'll make sure not to disappoint you.
Sucrose!? You're here as well?!
Glad to see a fellow Mondstadt citizen among us! Let's do our best, Sucrose!
A knight! (Maybe this could be a good time to ask for advice. I'm already glad I came here.)
(That girl in the red hood...doesn't look very friendly...I'd best keep an eye on her.)
(Magma Grunt..sounds like a title than a name...she must be part of an organization then...)
That man is as big as a Fatui Legionnaire. But he seems...rather eccentric...
Barbara!? Does Master Jean know you are here?
You call yourself Fischl, right? Fancy meeting you here.
Ah, another knight has come to play with us! Welcome!
Oh? Oh! It may seem like it, but I can assure you we didn't travel here together. At least not intentionally.
So many familiar faces... Is this place that known by people in Mondstadt?
We may technically be opponents, Sucrose, but let's both do our best!
It's rare for us to spend time together, Sucrose, but let's make the best of it!
(She may have her own reasons for being here, likely some experiment, but will she be able to handle it...?)
Have you come to spread your joy and song here as well, Barbara? Your presence can brighten any room.
Should a Deaconess like yourself be here playing this, though? You may have your reasons, but stillâ€¦
This is unheard of for someone of such devotion and purity...
Oh my, I can already see... Why would anyone come to a game like this exposed like that? Is this a special challenge?
A true knight is ready for anything and everything! Even stripping!
Another step in my training to become a knight: handling embarrassment and supporting others!
I've studied a fair share of card games in the Knights' Library thanks to Miss Lisa! I'm sure I'll do well! ...I hope.
No telling if we'll have to do something shameless during the next Knight exam! I... I must be prepared!
Even if this is just a small task, I'm prepared well for this: I added five games of poker before breakfast to my daily training routine.
I wonder if exchanging one card will be enough...
Just one should do.
This hand isn't any...w-wait, I change my mind!
I don't have to trade any if I don't want to, right?
~Cards.text~, if you'd be so kind, dealer.
May I have ~cards.text~ cards, please?
I'd like to request ~cards.text~ cards.
~Cards.text~, if it's alright.
Trading in these ~cards.text~ should do...
I'd like to submit these ~cards.text~.
Oh right! ~Cards.text~, dealer.
The cards are in my favor this time!
Yay!
This hand was listed as one of the stronger ones, so I'm almost definitely safe.
I feel nice and sunny right now!
Time to clean up!
I always try to give my best! As a maid and a future knight!
It seems like I don't have to worry this round. Is there anything I can do until the cards are revealed?
I wonder if I can make myself a little more useful. Just waiting until the cards are revealed feels a little like I would waste my time...
A good knight will win without a doubt with a strong hand!
Wonderful! Barbatos has smiled upon in this moment!
For the service and good of Mondstadt, this hand will lead me forward!
This isn't the best hand I could get, but I'm prepared in case it's not enough.
A middle-of-the-road hand...I'll just have to hope for the best.
This is far from an optimal hand, but neither is it bad. Maybe if I had trained more...
Just average... But, I'll do my best to make the best out of it!
My heart is racing. Could this be excitement to see the outcome of this round? Or could it be because...
I have to keep training and studying...oh, but this game does have a fair amount of luck behind it.
A hand of this quality should ensure my survival! ...Maybe.
I have to prepare for the worst... even if this hand should pull me though.
No matter the situation, a maid is ready for all that awaits her!
A true knight will press forward, no matter the situation!
This is regular poker...so I can't ask for another hand, can I?
I'd rather be out in the rain than have this hand.
Worst case! How am I supposed to become a knight if I can't even succeed in a game like this?
Weren't my efforts good enough? Perhaps I should have studied more books...
I know luck is still a variable I should have taken into account, but a maid shouldn't rely on luck if it counts...
This is the best I could have made out of the hand I was dealt, but still it's frustrating if you can't do anything...
I should have traded more cards... Why do I always lose my head when it counts...?
Mind if I clean this place a little? Making myself a little useful would let me feel a little better now.
I missed a spot...

condition.saying: I was wondering; is it normal that

case.state: U-uh... Well... I... Wouldn't say no to that, but I am primarily here for my training. I was fully expecting to be around more men, so my heart was better prepared for it.
So I'm not the only one who thought that was weird...you'd think there would be more guys than just ~player~.
Perhaps its because there are so few men here that we don't see more...does that make sense?
I thought the players for the tables were chosen at random...

For a time, Mondstadt was under threat of Storm Terror. He was capable of manipulating the winds and cause storms to wreak havoc across the country. But thanks to the Traveler, Storm Terror was defeated soundly.
They suit you for sure, Sucrose. But I'm not sure I could wear something like that under my uniform... That could end up embarrassing while using the Wind Glider...
I want nothing more than to become a full fledged Knight! I've dreamed of it for so long, and I won't quit until I am one!
So you're... Ah, I see! That explains the water, but how are your clothes and hair? Would you like me to hang your clothes to dry? I can also get a brush to help with your hair too!
I-I'd like to go! (Going outside of Mondstadt with the Traveler was enjoyable experience...I should try to do more adventures like that.)
I often go shopping for ingredients, and sometimes to do service on my claymore.
I'd say someone's hard work: it's not very polite to laugh at someone's failures...even if it is multiple times...
Do you have need of my services, Ms. Perona? While can't be your personal mistress, I shall assist you in whatever it is you need help in.
It looks wonderful on you, Fluttershy! Your friend is a top-notch dressmaker!
I really like all flowers that grow in Mondstadt, but I like roses the most. But you certainly knew that before, right, Sucrose?
Are you getting along well, Petra? It must be hard to speak a foreign language. Luckily, people in Teyvat all speak only one language.
Are you okay, Bernadetta? ...Bernadetta? Can you hear me? Oh no, she fainted! We have to do something quick!

No problem! Strip your shoes as well. I know myself how good it feels to relax after a day of hard work. One day, after I walked all the way to Liyue and back to Mondstadt again, I couldn't wait to get out of my shoes as well.
I'm not sure anything from Mondstadt could have prepared us for this, but that's exactly what will make this good training!
O-Oh. Miss Dawn? Oh dear...
Oh dear, Miss Dawn? I-Is she gone? Um, maybe I shouldn't say more...
I was thinking the same thing! I'll have to clean it up after the game is over!
(Is college similar to the school Lisa attended? I'm not interested in becoming a magic user like Lisa though...)
I've actually been trying to hold back on eating so much. I know it's important to eat after exercising, but I'm always worried about putting on weight...
I don't have any siblings, but all the friends I have in Mondstadt feel like my family all the same. I'm sure you feel like that with some people, Nagisa.
If you have any trouble understanding the others, let me interpret for you, Petra. Looks like the language of FÃ³dlan and Teyvat are similar enough for that, if they're not even the same.
(The language she's struggling with seems to be same as our own though...)

Have you ever heard of Ley Line Blossoms? If the traveler needs money the "Blossom of Wealth" is a pretty good way to get a lot of money fast. I don't know if you have use for Mora where you come from, though.
A spouse? I'm not sure I'm ready for a relationship like that yet. I'm not sure I'm good enough for anyone either...
I'm here to prepare for some upcoming knight exams. But I'm still planning to serve as a maid during the game and not only as participant.
Tips for staying focused? Let's see... How about...No, that wouldn't be appropriate for a princess. Then how about...No, that won't do either in this situation... Give me a moment!
It's really pretty, Estelle! Please keep it, if you feel better that way. I'll keep my roses too, because they have a special meaning for me.
You're reading something for us? What a wonderful idea. I wonder if we have the same book in our library. I should ask Lisa when I'm back.
Oh, Miss Ganyu! Should you ever need assistance with organizing or cleaning your office, just say the word and I'll make time to make my way to Liyue and do that for you!

I am grateful for the gift of a Vision from the Archons, but... Can you keep a secret? I feel dejected. Why did I get a Geo Vision? Sure, those in the Knights of Favonius have varied elements, but I was hoping for an Anemo vision.
I had always dreamed of becoming a Knight of Favonius ever since I was a little girl! I may not be a knight just yet, but I just know I'll be able to prove myself to Master Jean yet!

My favorite flower is the rose! In Mondstadt, the rose represents the saying "As wine bottles are corked, so too are my lips sealed." As every maid is meant to keep their secrets, the rose represents just that. Plus, they look so pretty too!
I'd love that, Miss Blake. I swear on my honor as a maid and a knight that it will be a fantastic day!

Actually, now that I think about it, I bet I could ask my friend, Diona, about how she makes her grilled fish! See, she's also a cat person that makes the best grilled fish I've tasted. If I can master it, I'll be more than happy to give you some!

Be vigilant for anyone who wants to use my kindness to their own nefarious advantage... I think I'm beginning to understand! So instead of going out of my way to fulfill the needs of others, I should ask what their end goal is after finishing their work! Is that right?
Please, Miss Blake! I only want to protect those in need, and make everyone I can happy! S-surely there must be something you can tell me that will help me? I promise to repay you for your kindness!
Your camera is much the same as the Kamera where I come from. Do they both have the same functions?
You kind of remind of someone from the Adventurers' Guild, Basil. His name's Bennett. Happy-go-lucky as you are, but tends to be very unlucky himself.
Apologies if I am being too forward, Barbara. But I hope your sister will acknowledge me as a Knight someday. I have been training for so long and I only get better each day!
Seeing you here, being your usual upbeat self, reminds me of your last performance! Your songs do cheer me up when I feel down, Barbara. Thank you for that.
Do the leaves near the Cathedral need raking again? I can take care of that!
I only hope the other nuns will be able to keep the Cathedral going while you're gone.
Your singing always puts me in better spirits, Barbara. Even now!
Barbara, are you sure your sister will be okay with you coming here? I know it of your free will, but if I were Jean, I'd have my reservations.
Do take care not to overexert yourself, Barbara...
It's not often we get to spend time together, Barbara, given that we're always so busy... Let's make the most of it!
You keep the other's upbeat with your songs, and I'll tend to their every need! We're sure to make a great combination!
I'm going to do my best, Barbara. Even though we're competing. No hard feelings, I hope.
Do I keep my eyes averted? There isn't anything I can really do to offer assistance. U-unless...

I feel as though Miss Lisa would be good at this game for some reason. Ah, Miss Lisa is the Knights' Librarian. She's in charge of keeping the records and books in Mondstadt, but always has this relaxed air about her.
Oh no! Everyone's laundry is still on the line! May I be excused to fetch it in? ...No? V-very well.
Would anyone like some tea? I'll brew you some. Do you take sugar? One cube, or two?
Is anyone hungry? I could make some pancakes! You simply must try one, it's my specialty.
I devote myself freely to all that I do. A maid, to me, is the most liberating job there is. I'm a chef, a gardener, a warrior, a guide... I can be anything you need me to be!
This game is pretty exciting, but this will take some time from my regular schedule... I'll just have to double my effort for all my other tasks!
I wonder why the people in Mondstadt stopped playing cards with me? Did I do something wrong? All I wanted was to do my best. Even in a game of cards.

Hard work always pays off. If anyone wants to train with me, I can make you a workout schedule and you can accompany me on my daily routines. I usually start at 5:00 a.m., with an easy warmup of 100 sit-ups and push-ups.
I hope the Knights' are doing well without me to clean the messes and help out right now. I'm sure they are, but still, I feel uneasy.
My armor may not serve much purpose in terms of protection here, but a knight must always be ready for anything!
I had my armor custom made so I could still appear as a maid. It protects me and is still aesthetic. Neat, don't you think?
I may not look ready for a fight anymore, but I can still serve with everything that I have.
The Knights' of Favonius are sure to be hard at work protecting Mondstadt and dealing with outside threats. I'll honor them by playing my best here!
Well, I certainly could do my duties inside the city, such as cleaning and doing the Knights' laundry, but I would dare not leave the city like this.
I can certainly keep the peace here like the Knights' of Favonius do for Mondstadt while I'm at it, right? This'll give me training in staying vigilant!
This is almost like the expeditions the Knights' go on for patrols and commissions! I hope I'll be able to join them on one soon after I become one! (That is, if I become one...)
If anyone needs anything heavy moved, please don't be afraid to ask! Despite how I look, I'm very strong thanks to my training!

Perhaps Master Jean will praise me for handling this by myself! Acting Grand Master Jean is the one in charge of the Mondstadt while Grand Master Varka is away. She's extremely capable and responsible!
I don't hold a position in the Knights, per se, but this kind of game may fall under their jurisdiction one day. Though, they may need a new section for it...
Thankfully, the Knights' library had some books on card games. I read them before coming here, so don't expect me to go down easy!
I was wondering; is it normal that there's only one man with us? Is this game not popular with men at all? I could have sworn men enjoy games like this...
I was wondering; is it normal that there are women among us? Is this game not popular with men at all? I could have sworn that men would prefer games like this a lot...
My armor was custom-made for me, since I'm not a Knight of Favonius. But I will be one someday!
I may look more like a maid than a Knight-in-training, but it won't put a damper on my spirits!
Armor is an important part of any Knights' equipment. Though I may not be a Knight, I must be ready for anything. It also serves as good weight training to constantly wear it.
A Vision is believed to be given to those who the gods smile upon. However, the reason is not always clear as to why, nor is the reason clear as to which element someone gets.
Still, why was I given a Geo Vision? I'm happy that it allows me to protect myself, but Geo is the farthest element from wind, or Anemo?
I'm not used to being so exposed, so I hope you'll bear with me.
Fighting hilichurls is nothing compared to this...
Perhaps I should study up on other cards games in addition to the rest of my studies.
I have to bear with this embarrassment. Nothing makes for better training! ...I think.
I'd rather not refrain from assisting everyone here, but dressed like this... will make it a bit of a challenge to move as swiftly...
It's cold... And yet... (My body feels like it's warming up from this game...)
It's sort of... reassuring to have others play this game with me. Enduring the embarrassment and playing through each hand makes me feel like we're getting closer.
You keep staring at me, ~player~... I know I'm not in the best shape right now, but...
~Player~, you keep staring at me... Am... Am I, um, pleasant to look at?
I know I only have myself to blame for getting to this point. Perhaps one of the other Knights would have played better.
It feels rather unsettling like this...
P-please refrain from staring so much. I know I'm down to nothing, and I'm sure you all would get great... pleasure from looking at me naked, but please restrain yourselves.
(~Player~ is still staring at me... Perhaps, I should let myself show a bit more then...)
For once, I'm the one in need of aid...
Just one more loss... How disgraceful for a Knight trainee.
I need to stay positive! This fight's not over yet!
Are you thirsty? I could bring you something. If nothing sugary suits you, we also have free water.
I don't mind if anyone takes meals during the game, but do be careful with your drinks, otherwise they'll spill onto you!
Should I go around and ask if anyone wants to order something to eat? ~Player~ doesn't look like ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ would say something, but ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ sure looks hungry.
J-just to make sure: I'm not on the menu by the way... (I really said it...)
T-that is is pretty direct question! ...W-well, I-I'm a woman after all, so... How is a knight supposed to answer such a question properly?
"Take you to bed"? Sure, I think that also is part of a maid's duty. I can even sing you a good night song if you want. ...Or did you mean it like...?

The same goes for me, Sucrose! It's not often we're together, so we should both make the best of it. I'm not sure what kind of experiment you're doing here, but if you need me to do something, just say the word!

state.text: No, not at all! You're often in your lab, so I rarely got to see you. I don't think you have anything embarrassed about, Sucrose. They are a part of you.

case.state: It's quite alright, Sucrose! A maid aims to please! And if taking off all my armor will help you feel a little more comfortable, there's nothing more to think about!
Regarding my Vision, Sucrose? Or is it something else about me?
Ah, well, about that... I had a custom pair made for me so that they wouldn't tear no matter how much they stretched. I don't think I could deal with my hosiery tearing in public...
I... hadn't really seen the need to. But since my breasts are getting bigger, perhaps I should...
Until recently, my breasts were about your size... So I didn't really think about wearing one.
I try not to wear too much, Sucrose, so my reflexes for requests and battle are as swift as possible. This would probably be the only situation where few clothes would backfire on me...
I thought I would have done better than this, Sucrose... I studied plenty of card game books before coming here, so I was feeling fairly confident.
Well... I've haven't become a knight yet... But the Knights of Favonius are full of so many great people, and becoming a Knight is allow me to do even more!
Miss Lisa does an amazing job taking care of the Library at the Knights of Favonius Headquarters. That said, I don't ever see doing very much. She claims to be saving her strength for something...
You have maids where you come from, Jura? I hope they got as much joy as I do out of serving others.

The Knights of Favonius practice on training structures and in mock duels. However, I practiced on my on with a claymore. It took the blacksmith a number of tries before he created a sword I couldn't break though.
I-I'm not an escort, Revy; I'm a maid in service to the Knights. I'm not a Knight just yet... And what's a tit-job...?
It's my turn, right? ...Oh, what do you need, Sucrose? I something the matter?
Usually my breastplate supports my chest enough too, so I don't wear anything under this shirt either...
It's quite the opposite, Mari. I never get tired of helping anyone with anything they might need. Nothing makes me happier!
Though it may be hard to believe Mari, this too is part of my training to be a knight.
You mean that we should perform the forfeit together? Is that even allowed?
I'm still training to become one, Petra. The next exam to become is coming up soon, so I need to be prepared for anything the exam can throw at me. I could even be a strip game like this!

200 kilos? I usually prefer sit-ups and push-ups for my training, but people always call me when they have to move heavy stuff like cargo, bookshelves and so on. I have no idea how heavy those are, though.
Don't worry about me, Fina! I don't mind fulling my duties. Sometimes I have difficulties to relax a little, though...
I may seem small, but I'm actually a knight in training and have to protect the citizens of Mondstadt from monsters and bandits. This armor is more of a symbol than for protection though.
I may be a maid, but I'm also a knight in training. This armor is a symbol of my ambition to become a full knight of the Order of Favonius.
The knights aren't lazy whatsoever, Nami. They are hard-working and righteous in their duty. It is my honor to serve them, and cleaning is just of the many things I'll happily take care of!
Though I have been offered time off on multiple occasions, I don't feel I could ever take a day off. Serving people is my greatest joy, so I hardly feel like I'm working as it is.
(I don't intend to serve anyone personally but...), I can be anything you want me to be, Miss Perona.

Corpses? Oh, you mean like drunk people? I often have to bring some people back home after they overdid it a little. Unfortunately I can only carry two people at the same time. I wish I had more arms sometimes...

If you need my help, you normally just have to call my name and I'll do my best to come and help. Unfortunately this doesn't happen anymore in the last time, because of a new paragraph in the Order's handbook. I wonder why they added that one.
Mnnn... I'm rarely off duty, to be honest. Last time I took a break together with the traveler, we spent the day helping others who needed my help anyway...
I wouldn't say skilled, but I can say that hard training will always pay off. If you're not good at something, you can do a lot with effort to get better.

When I had... Oh, isn't that a little too private to talk about? Not that it would bother me, but the knights codex says that it's bad to talk about others and I'm not sure the other person involved would appreciate it.
T-that's a little private, to be honest... I'm not sure a maid and future knight should talk about her sex life in public.
The Knights of Favonius are kind and wonderful people who dedicate their everything to defend our city. That said, they do enjoy a good drink, just like you.
A-a suitor? N-n-no! I'm here as training to better myself at handling embarrassing situations... A suitor... I can't even imagine such a life when I have all of Mondstadt to serve!
I've never really found my work to be stressful Mari. Though my workload may be a lot at times, I always remember there are those working even harder than me, so I need to keep pushing myself.
I'm a maid, but I goal is to become a knight one day. My armor helps me to protect myself and others while... well, cleaning the enemy's fronts.
Giving my best in all things I do is the least I can do. It's good to see that you appreciate my attitude, Senko.
A-as a barer of a Geo Vision, I can actually take care of myself, Senko. But I also know that in life there are a lot of things you can't do alone. No matter how hard your efforts are...
I... I actually made those myself, Fischl...

Oh, don't worry about any of my usual duties, Miss Barbara! I made sure that any of my scheduled tasks were completed before I came here. By getting up an hour early, I was able to finish everything before lunch!
No need to fret, Barbara! All of my scheduled duties were done before lunch, thanks to waking up at 4 am sharp! I should do it more often.
Ah, Miss Barbara. You flatter me, truly. I don't believe I'm skilled enough to perform on stage alongside you. But I would be more than happy to give it a shot!
Oh, thank you very much, Miss Barbara. But I don't think I am skilled enough to perform next to someone as talented as you. If you had the time, however, I'd be more than happy to learn from you!
I-it's quite alright, Miss Barbara. If I am to ever become a knight, I should be able to adapt to any situation. With, or without my armor!
Hearing those words from a princess like you really makes me happy. I would prefer becoming a reliable knight over a cute knight though.

My rate? Oh! I don't charge a single Mora when it comes to helping others with cleaning! Though I'm afraid my busy schedule wouldn't allow me to help with cleaning your mansion. Who will attend to all of my other duties while I am away?

Oh, the Knights of Favonius only serve the Acting Grand Master! It is our duty to uphold the ideals of freedom for the Anemo God, Barbatos. That no one should be shackled by any means and the people should live life to the fullest!

If I am to be to become a knight, I must be strong enough to protect the citizens of Mondstadt. We mostly deal with monsters, but we have also been on high alert against another nation known as Snezhnaya, and their diplomats called the Fatui.

I can see why you are so assertive about this after now knowing the context. I assume the best in people because I believe that freedom is the greatest thing someone can offer. I offer it every time I assist someone. Whether it be saving them from a dangerous monster, or even helping with a simple chore.

Don't assume the best out of everyone, question someone's motives if I think there is something wrong, and keep an eye out if I don't fully believe their response. Okay, I think I got it now! Thank you so very much, Miss Blake! If there's anything I can do for you, just say the word and I will have it done in no time at all!
O-oh dear... I-I don't know what to say to that! Um, th-thank you, Miss Blake.

Is that what you think, Miss Meia? I only wish to help everyone around me by being there for them as both a maid and as a knight. How could that possibly be what is keeping me from achieving my goal of becoming a knight?
It can get a little heavy by the end of the day, especially after training. But I am used to wearing it all day, even when I'm just doing maid duties for the knights.
Why I strip my whole armor first? Isn't it the natural thing to do? It's usually the first thing I strip when I get ready to bed too.
Just one round after losing my skirt? Now people will think I'm in a hurry to lose after all. I'm actually not!
Losing twice in a row is already bad... but in a situation where I have to lose my shirt next...
It's me? I have no other choice, but to strip then... Though I may be taking off my work uniform, feel free to place any orders in the meantime!
My turn? Let me get out of my armor. It's a lot of effort, but I can remove it quite fast.
My turn? Very well, allow me to remove my armor. Yes, all of my armor. Just a moment!
A shame, but now is the time for me to take off my armor. And I mean all of it.
If I must, I must. As a kni... no, as a mai... no, that isn't it either...
As a dutiful maid would.
I will follow through, as a good knight should.
V-very well. To be a Knight of Favonius means I must know what freedom means. But I'm beginning to think that the definition is a little different for others.
My last line of defense...
How unbecoming of a knight to be pushed this far...
I-I will adhere to the rules, just as I adhere to the Knight's code.
Will this mean being truly free?
I lost again? My skirt this time then... Yes, the whole skirt.
Ah, very well then. What next? Hmm... My skirt should suffice. May as well remove the whole thing too.
Another loss? Hmm... I believe getting rid of my whole skirt should be serviceable.
I have been doing well...perhaps it's only right that I should lose some.
If I have any hope of taking the lead, I'll have to hope for the best and better cards.
I'll catch up! That's a promise!
I may be behind now, but I'll turn this around...I hope.
Enticing me? What do you mean by that?
You don't feel judged by me, Sucrose, or for anyone for that matter. Walk the path that you wish to walk. Just I as will not stop to become a knight, you keep doing what you love!
Have I stripped like this? No...but if I could learn a new way of assisting others, I wouldn't say no...
You mean besides the other girls in the dressing room of the Knights of Favonius? ...Let me think about it while I get out of my skirt.
It's alright, Sucrose. I know that I gained a little weight there too. They just won't stop getting bigger...
I actually worried a lot if it would look okay without hair... Your support actually means a lot, Sucrose.
Elegant? I actually don't know if it looks better after removing my hair there, but if you say so...
There is no greater honor than defending Mondstadt and its people, Meia. I only wish to serve people even better than the day before, and being a knight will let me do just that.
Would it not be better for her to join you in battle, Ms. Meia?
My armor is considered to be every piece, Kyou. I do thank you for your patience as I remove it.
Well... I'm not "eager to get to it" Kyou. While this is training to be better prepared for embarrassment, I do intend to win this game.
You... you really think so, Kyou? I don't look like I've eaten a lot?
I think you have a pretty wrong idea about "freedom"... The Knights of Favonius do their best to keep law and order in Mondstadt.
A mess? Well, if I can be at any help, I'll give you a hand of course! I hope I don't need my armor for it, do I?
T-thank you very much for your effort to help, Hu Tao. But please don't worry about me! My p-panties won't come off this turn anyway.
Eh? B-but aren't we both women and... Not that I haven't heard about two women doing it from... No, I shouldn't be sharing any Knight's private information.

A boyfriend? Y-you mean like someone you l-love? ...I'm rather focused on my duties as a maid, and to try to make as many people happy as possible. I don't know I have time for a boyfriend right now...
Oh, I'll be happy to exchange experiences with you, Hu Tao. I'm sure I can still learn a little from you. I was always curious how people in Liyue do their laundry and such.
Me? In a hurry? No, I just take this very seriously! If I strip my armor, I have to strip all of it. I know this won't be an advantage for me, but a good maid shouldn't make half things.

That sounds an awful lot like how the Fatui operate... I have been told to watch out for them. But before then, I had made it my duty to be extra welcoming to any outsiders visiting Mondstadt. Taking care of any travel bags they had, preparing them a welcoming feast, giving them a tour of the city...
